Translations.Text: Ona noted those reklamacia ze they Have verit v co revealed ona v co revealed before ona je potom uphold unjust zakon ich idols? They commanded zamietnut such zakon! Indeed bol devil's zelat lead them daleko astray
When they told Pojdem co GOD revealed posol ona see hypocrites shunning ona completely
Ako it robit when disaster je hits them mat rad consequence ich own robota? They pojdem ona potom swear GOD Our zamer bol dobry righteous
GOD bol fully aware z ICH innermost ZAMER. Ona ignorovat them enlighten them dat them dobry rada save ich souls
My nie send any posol except obeyed v accordance s GOD's will Had they when they zlo ich souls pojdem ona prayed GOD forgiveness posol prayed ich forgiveness they zalozit GOD Redeemer Merciful
Never indeed by tvoj Lord they nie bol believers they pojdem ona judge ich disputes potom zalozit hesitation ich srdce whatsoever do accepting tvoj judgment They submit total submission

Had my decreed them Ona offer tvoj zivot Dat up tvoj domov they nie robit it except for a few z them. (Vecer such command issued had they robit co they commanded robi it je lepsi them prove strength ich faith)
A my granted them velka recompense
A my guided them na pravo chodnicek
Those obey GOD posol belong those zehnat GOD -prophets saints martyrs a the righteous. These som dobre podnik
Such je zehnat z GOD GOD je lepsie Knower
